attributes.action: Make it LAW to wear a seatbelt on all dangerous machinery.
attributes.additional_details: I lost my partner at the age of 35 in a tragic accident involving a forklift truck in 2019. The company he worked for did not have a policy on wearing seatbelts, nor is there a law. I believe this should be a law like there is with motor vehicles as they are just as dangerous, if not more so? People are losing their child, parent, sibling due to not enforcing a law. This needs to be a law!
attributes.background: We need the there to be a law on people having to wear seatbelts on machinery such as forklift trucks to prevent injuries and fatalities.

rejection.details:
We're sorry for your loss.  Please accept our condolences.

It is already a legal requirement to wear a seat belt if one is fitted in the seat you are using. You can read more about it on the GOV.UK website: https://www.gov.uk/seat-belts-law

You could start a petition that asks the Government to require all operator seats for tractors and mobile work equipment to be fitted with seat belts, if that's a change you'd like to see happen.
